data.message: Dear Facebook my mother's account was hacked last week and I've reported it several times and nothing has been done about it and the person has since made it aware that he has hacked it even though her pictures are still on there along with several other family members of ours as well including her grandchildren but every time it's been reported nothing has been done now since he has hacked her Facebook account everything she had linked to it has been hacked as well including her personal information so now will someone do something about this or not?

replies.message: Hi Noah. If your mother can't get into her account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell her to go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2qcYjBp. -William
